plot: Joe is a guitar addict. His problem has affected his family and relationships for many years. Now, with the support of his brothers, Joe finally seeks help.
title: The Ukulele Method
plot_es: Joe is a guitar addict. His problem has affected his family and relationships for many years. Now, with the support of his brothers, Joe finally seeks help.
plot_en: Joe is a guitar addict. His problem has affected his family and relationships for many years. Now, with the support of his brothers, Joe finally seeks help.
